name: Tilt Arcade
description:
A 4-in-1 portable gaming experience for your wrist. 4 beautiful games, and each harnesses Apple Watch's powerful accelerometer. Tilt your way to victory! Details for each game are below:

Car Escape:
Race past obstacles and other drivers - tilt screen to navigate your speedy vehicle!


Tilt Fall:
Alter the world's gravity by tilting the watch. Collect stars and jump over obstacles as you attempt to continue the endless fall!

Plane Escape:
Survive an all out aerial attack from the enemy. Tilt to navigate!

Color Splash:
Capture the rain droplets in the corresponding buckets. Guide the endless rain by reorienting the watch's screen!
